column2: Kenya hatowe ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera utera Covid-19
column3: Ubundi bwoko bwa coronavirus bwatowe muri Kenya, nk'uko bigaragazwa n'ivyambere vyavuye mu bushakashatsi buriko burakorwa n'ikigo c'ubushakashatsi mu buvuzi gikorana na reta, Kenya Medical Research Institute,Kemri. Ubwo bwoko Kenya yisangije, bwari bwatowe mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bw'igihugu ku cigwa cakozwe hagati y'ukwezi kwa gatandatu n'ukwezi kw'icumi, nk'uko vyavuzwe na Kemri. Hari hagikenewe gukorwa ubundi bushakashatsi  kugira hamenyekane ingaruka z'ubwo bwoko bushasha, nk'uko kibandanya kibivuga. Kenya gushika ubu haharurwa hafi abantu 100.000 bamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19 n'abarenga 1.700 iyo ndwara imaze kwica. Hagati aho bwa bwoko bunyaruka kwandukira cane bwatowe muri Africa y'epfo bumaze gutorwa mu bindi bihugu bitatu vyo muri Africa-Botswana bihana urubibe,Zambia na Gambia muri Africa y'Uburengero, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi, OMS. Ubu Africa imaze kurengana igitigiri c'umuliyoni w'abantu bamaze kwandura uwo mugera, abandura ku munsi akaba ari benshi gusumba umurindi wa mbere, nk'uko OMS ibandanya ivuga. Muri rusangi abantu bashika 25.223 nibo bavugwa ko bandura ku munsi hagati y'itariki 28 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na kabiri mu 2020 n'itariki 10 z'ukwa mbere uyu mwaka  muri Africa, igitigiri kiri kuri 39% hejuru y'icashitse kw'isonga mu ndwi zibiri zo mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2020, aho abandura bashika 18.104 ku munsi, nk'uko bivugwa na OMS.

column2: Theodore McCarrick yahoze ari kardinali muri US arahakana ivyo gufata ku nguvu yagirizwa
column3: Uwahoze ari kardinali wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arahakana ivyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu umwana w'umuhungu w'imyaka 16 mu myaka ya 1970. Theodore McCarrick, 91, yarengutse imbere ya sentare i Massachusetts kugira yisigure ku vyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu no gukubagura (coups et blessures) yagirizwa ko yakoze mu 1974. Uyu mu kardinali yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Washington DC azwi ko ari we mutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Amerika yagirijwe ivyaha vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Imbere y'aho yahora avuga ko atibuka ko hoba hari ivyo guhohotera yoba yarakoze. Mu rubanza rwashinzwe mu kw'indwi, McCarrick yaragirijwe ivyo gukwegakwegera uyo mwana w'umuhungu - ariko atavuzwe izina -  mu buhumbu, mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike. Uyu mugabo avuga ko yakorewe aya mabi yavuze ko igihe kimwe vyabaye mu gihe yari mu bugeni bwa mwenewabo kuri kaminuza ya Wellesley muri Massachusetts mu 1974. Nyene gukorerwa aya mabi avuga ko McCarrick yamukwegeye mu cumba kimwe co muri iyo kaminuza aca atangura kumukuyakuya. Inyuma yaho, uyo mupatiri avugwa ko yaciye abwira uyu mugabo kuvuga ibisabisho kugira ngo akire "ibicumuro". Muri sentare ku wa gatanu, McCarrick yategetswe kutavugana n'uyu nyene guhohoterwa canke n'umwana n'umwe. Yasabwe gutanga ingwati y'ibihumbi 5000 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika, mu gihe bitegekanijwe ko asubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 28 z'ukw'icumi. Buri caha gishobora guhanishwa umunyororo wo gushika ku myaka itanu, kandi agategerezwa kwandikwa ku nguvu nk'umusambanyi (d√©linquant sexuel/sex offender) McCarrick ni umwe mu bategetsi ba Ekleziya Katorika bagirizwa gushurashuza abana mu kiringo c'imyaka mirongo. Mu 2019, yarakuwe mu mabanga inyuma y'amatohoza yakozwe na Vaticano ku vyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu mu myaka itari mike. Yaragirijwe kandi ko yafashe ku nguvu umuyabaga i New York hagati mu myaka ya 1970, yongera ahatira abagabo kuryamana nawe mu rugo i New Jersey mu gihe bariko bigira ubupatiri. Icegeranyo c'impapuro 450 ca Vaticano casanze Papa Yohani Paulo wa kabiri yarabwiwe ivyerekeye ibi vyagirizwa McCarrick, ariko agahitamwo kwizera abepiskopi ba Amerika bamukingiye ikibaba. Casanze kandi Papa Benoit/Benedict XVI - yatanze imihoho mu 2013 - ashobora kuba yaranse iciyumviro co gukora amatohoza kubera ata "vyemezo vyari bihari" ku vyo yagirizwa.

column2: Coronavirus: Igituma gukaraba intoke bigoye mu bihugu bimwe bimwe
column3: Mu gihe mu bihugu vya Buraya hamwe n'ibindi bikize ubuzima busa n'ubwahagaze mu ntumbero yo guhangana na coronavirus, ku ma miriyoni y'abantu nta cizere c'uko bazoshobora gukurikirikiza impanuro za OMS nko gukaraba intoke no kutegerana. Abantu baharugwa ku muriyaridi baba mu tuzu tw'utururi bakaba bagize 30% vy'ababa mu bisagara kw'isi. Ayo mazu babamwo atanga akayaga gake, kandi nta  nzira y'imicafu afise, bigatuma ingwara zikwiragira vyoroshe. Celestine Adhiambo, w'imyaka  43 aba mu gace ka Mukuru karimwo amazu aciriritse cane i Nairobi n'umugabo wiwe hamwe n'abana 6. Inzu y'umuryango igizwe n'icumba kimwe abamwo ntifise amazi n'umuyagankuba. Avuga ko abana biwe badashobora kuyigendagendamwo badacanyeko. Yabariye BBC ati: ''Ntivyodushobokera ko umwana atandukanywa n'uwundi mu gihe hokwaduka ubwandu. Nta kibanza dufise. Nta cumba kiri ngaha. Leta yari ikwiye gutwara kwa muganga abanduye." Umugabo wiwe akora nk'umubaji kandi ku minsi akora yinjiza amashilingi 400 y'ama Kenya, n'ukuvuga amahera y'amongereza 3,15 kandi umuryango wiwe ukoresha amashilling 50 mu kugura utudobo cumi tw'amazi. Ariko ibigo bitanga amazi ntibimenyerwa,  kandi mu misi ata mazi abonetse, umuryango usanga uhevye kwoga kwo gucishako wari ubimenyereye. Mu gace ka Mukuru haba abantu igice c'umuliyoni kirenga. Amazu yaho akozwe mu bipukuru canke ibikoresho vya plastike mugihe abifise bubakisha amabati. Nta gukusanya umucafu ngo uje gutabwa kubaho, mwinshi muri wo ukaba ukaba utabwa mu ruzi. Ishirahamwe ridaharanira inyungu ryo muri ako karere ryitwa Mercy Mukuru, rihafise amashure ane y'intango arimwo abanyeshure 7.000. Hafi y'icakabiri c'abo ntibashobora kuronka isabuni, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuyobozi w'iryo shirahamwe, Mary Killeen. Madamu Adhiambo yagize ati: "Mfise umwitwarariko. Uyu mugera niwakwiragira muri aka karere, ibara rizogwa." Muganga Pierre Mpele, yahoze aserukira ikigo mpuzamakungu kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu bihugu vyinshi vya Afrika y'uburengero yavuze ko amazu yo muri Afrika ashobora kurangwamwo abantu benshi, aho binashika ko abantu 12 basangira inzu y'icumba kimwe. Yagize ati ''gushira abantu mu kibanza ca bonyene ntibizokunda ahantu henshi''. Si amazu gusa y'abantu baciciriritse ariko aragira ikibazo c'ubukene bw'amazi. Ibisagara vya Johannesbourg na Chennai vyose vyarahatswe gukamamwo amazi mu mwaka uheze. Shanthi Sasindranath, Nyina w'abana 2, aba mu micungararo y'igisagara ca Chennai yabariye BBC ati: "Nihaba ubukene bw'amazi nko mu mwaka uheze, bizogorana kuronka amazi yo gukaraba intoke incuro nyinshi. " Mugihe c'ubukene bw'amazi mu mwaka uheze, umuryango wiwe warashoboye kubaho nabi nabi ugura amazi adasukuye ava mu mariba y'abarimyi ku  bilometero birenga 50. Hari utuzu twa surwumwe twagenewe bose duke cane kandi abanyagihugu ntibakurikiza impanuro zitangwa n'abaganga. "Mw'igaliyamoshi, abantu bakorora  bari hafi yawe, ata na kimwe bikingirije ku munwa. Bishitse nkabishira hejuru, bamwe muri bo barasaba ikigongwe, abandi bakeyi nabo bagatangura gushwana." Incuti n'abagenzi bagenda inzu yiwe imisi yose kandi Sasindranath ntaramenya ingene yogabanya kubonana n'abantu. "Ndiko mbarira abana banje ko bakaraba intoke kenshi kandi buke buke. Nababariye ko bategerezwa kwoga mu minwe iyo boba bavuye hose, naho boba bamazeyo iminuta 5. Nk'umuryango ntidutembera cane nk'uko twahora tubikora." Muganga Poppy Lamberton, yigisha ibikorwa birangurigwa kwa Muganga muri Kaminuza ya Glasgow mu Bwongereza yavuze ko amaleta ategerezwa kwongera utwigoro. "Amaleta amwe amwe arakenye, ariko ntakenye nk'abantu. Mugihe hoba ikiza yari akwiye gushobora gushira ikibano cose ahaconyene." Ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, kiriko kirarondera ingene gifasha amaleta mu ntumbero yafashe mu  kurwanya uyu mugera, ariko Muganga Mpele ashaka ko hashirwaho intumbero  zo  gufasha ibihugu biri mu nzira y'amajambere. Ariko kandi asaba inguvu mu guhamagarira abayobozi kugira umwete imbere y'uko iki kiza gikwiragira hose ku mugabane wa Afrika. Yagize ati ''Iciza n'uko uyu mugera utariko urakwiragira cane ku mugabane wa Afrika. Ibitigiri vyinshi vy'abantu bamaze kumenyekana ko banduye uyo mugera bigizwe n'abagendeye mu Bushinwa no mu Bulaya. Ntituzi igituma utariko urakwiragira cane. OMS ivuga ko kwanduzanya ku batagize ingendo biri ku rwego rwo hasi cane ku mugabane wa Afrika kandi yuko gukumira ico kiza ari yo ntambwe nziza. Tugarutse mu karere ka Mukuru bisa n'uko ata na kimwe cahidutse muri izi ndwi ziheze. Madamu Adhiambo avuga yumva ata bushobozi na bumwe afise, akaba ariko arakora ikintu kimwe gusa ashoboye. Yagize ati: ''Ndiko nsenga Imana ngo idukingire uyu mugera twebwe n'ikibano cacu''.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru : Sterling, Vlahovic, Zidane, Pochettino, Rangnick, Perisic
column3: Manchester City igiye kwongereza inguvu kugira ngo ishobore kugumana umukinyi wayo wo ku ruhande, umwongereza Raheem Sterling, 26, mu masezerano ashobora kumara igihe kirekire, ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko ariko araronderwa na Barcelona. (Telegraph - subscription required) Paris St-Germain yagiriraniye ibiganiro na Zinedine Zidane mu gihe yitegurira igenda ry'umumenyereza wayo Mauricio Pochettino ariko araronderwa na Manchester United. (Le Parisien, via Metro) Ralf Rangnick ashobora kuba agiye kumenyereza vy'agateganyo Manchester United, ariko akaba yari yabanje kwanka amasezerano Old Trafford yashaka kumuha, imbere y'uko bumvikana ku yandi mashasha.  (Manchester Evening News) Manchester United yahambije iyindi mirwi itari mike, harimwo na Tottenham hamwe na Newcastle United, mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Fiorentina umunya Serbia Dusan Vlahovic w'imyaka 21. (Mail) Manchester United iracipfuza ko Pochettino ayibera umumenyereza kuva mu ci riza, n'aho yiteze umuzo wa Rangnick. (90 Min) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Lazio Sergej Milinkovic-Savic, 26, ariko araronderwa na Manchester United nk'uwushobora gusubirira umufaransa akina hagati Paul Pogba, 28, kuko amasezerano afitaniye na Old Trafford azorangira mu ci riza. (Fichajes - in Spanish) Barcelona iriko iraraba ko yogura umusatirizi wa Basel umunya Bresil Arthur Cabral, 23, ariko bikazoba ngombwa ko ibanza kugurisha bamwe mu bakinyi kugira ngo ishobore kumugura.  (Goal) Amasezerano umukinyi wo ku ruhande umunya-Croatia Ivan Perisic, 32, afitaniye na Inter Milan arangira mu kwa gatandatu 2022, uyu mukinyi akavuga ati "vyose birashoboka, tuzobiraba mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere", aho yari abajijwe ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe.  (Mediaset Infinity, via Football Italia) Inter Milan irafise ivyizigiro ko umuninyi wayo wo hagati, umunya-Croatia Marcelo Brozovic, 29, azotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha, ni mu gihe ayahari azorangira mu ci riza. (90 Min) Kuri uyu wa gatanu, vyitezwe ko umumenyereza wa AC Milan Stefano Pioli, 56, atera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y'imyaka ibiri iri imbere ari kumwe n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano, Serie A. column2: Ukraine: Russia yatanze agahengwe mu bisagara bibiri kugira abahunga bahunge ariko ntikubahirijwe
column3: Ingabo z'Uburusiya zabandanije zicucagira ibibombe mu gisagara ca Mariupol kuri uno wa gatandatu, mu gihe bwari bwemeye gutanga agahengwe mu masaha yo mu gitondo - ibi bikaba vyatumye ibikorwa vyo guhungisha abantu bihagarara. Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya  bwari bwatangaje  ko butanze agahengwe kuva isaha zine mu masaha ya Moscou mu bisagara bibiri vya  Mariupol na Volnovakha  kugira ngo abasivire bashobore kuva muri ibi bisagara. Ni nyuma y'uko umukuru w'igisagara ca Mariupol asabiye ko botanga agahengwe ku banyagihugu mu gihe kibandanya kizingurijwe, hamwe n'ico yita ibitero vy'ubugome vy'ingabo z'Uburusiya. Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya buvuga ko iyi yari ingingo yumvikanyweko n'abategetsi ba Ukraine. Umwe mu baba muri iki gisagara ati: "Ubu ndi muri Mariupol, ndi kw'ibarabara, uko iminota itatu canke itanu iheze numva ibibombe". "Agahengwe katanzwe kugira ngo abantu bashobore gukura meza ntikubahirijwe. Mbona n'amamodoka y'abantu bari bagerageje guhunga ariko aragaruka. Ni akajagari gusa". Kari agahenwe katanzwe inyuma y'aho Vadym Boichenko umukuru w'igisagara ca Mariupol asohoreye itangazo n'umubabaro mwinshi asaba ko amayira y'iki gisagara yokwugururwa kugira abahunga bahunge kuko ata kundi bari bugire. Ati: "Mariupol si amabarabara n'amazu, ni abanyagihugu bayo". Niko gahengwe ka mbere nk'aka kari gatanzwe kuva Uburusiya butanguye igitero ku gihugu ca Ukraine haraciye imisi cumi. Uburusiya buvuga ko bwumvikanye kwugurura amayira hanze y'ibi bisagara. Boichenko ati: "Bivanye n'uko abaduteye babandanya baducucagira amabombe ata kigongwe, nta kundi turi bugire atari uko twoha abahaba ‚Ä¶ akaryo ko kuva muri Mariupol mu mahoro". Haciye amasaha atatu aka gahengwe kategerezwa gutangura isaha zine mu masaha ya Moscou gatangajwe, abategetsi ba Mariupol bahavuye batangaza ko igikorwa cari gitegekanijwe co guhungisha abantu cahagaze kubera ibibombe vyabandanije vyisukira. Itangazo basohoye rivuga riti: "Dusavye abantu i Mariupol gusubira mu mazu yabo, turabamenyesha ibijanye no kubahungisha ni vyakunda". "Kubera Uburusiya butariko burubahiriza agahengwe bukabandanya butera Mariupol no mu micungararo yayo, ivyo guhungisha abantu bibaye birabangira". Uburusiya ntaco buratangaza kuri ibi bivugwa, ariko umushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi butangaza ko abasivire batakoresheje amayira yari yuguruye kuva i Mariupol na  Volnovakha bwongera bwagiriza abategetsi ba Ukraine ko ari bo babujije abantu guhunga, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ibinyamakuru vy'Uburusiya. Mariupol ni igisagara kiri ku nkengera y'inyanja mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Ukraine gituwemwo n'abantu 450.000, kikaba kigoswe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya kakdn ikbandanya giterwa amabombe. Mu gihe coramuka gifashwe, koba ari akaryo Uburusiya buronse bwo kugenzura kimwe mu bivuko bikomeye vy'igihugu ca Ukraine kandi bugaca buronka umuhora ufatanya ya ntara ya Crim√©e/Crimea bwigarurira mu 2014 hamwe na twa turere twiganziwe n'inyeshamba zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya mu ntara za Luhansk na Donetsk, Volnovakha yoyo ni agasagara gato kari mu buraruko bwa Mariupol kakaba karangwamwo intambara zikomeye kuva iki gitero gitangura.

column2: Burundi: BRB yugaye amashirahamwe agurisha amafaranga
column3: Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yaraye ifashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro yari asanzwe yemewe. Mwitangazo ryasohowe n'umukuru w'iyo banki, Ciza Jean, avuga ko iyo ngingo izotangura kuja mu ngiro mu ndwi iza, igenekerezo rya 15 z'uku kwa kabiri. Yagiriza ayo mashirahamwe ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyo ngo bikaba vyaragize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu. Mu kwezi kw'icenda umwaka uheze, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Muri iryo tangazo, Bwana Ciza ategeka abafise amazu yo kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga y'agaciro gukuraho vuba na bwango ivyapa n'ibindi bimenyetso biyaranga. Amenyesha ko kuva ubu, amazu yemerewe kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga mvamakungu ari ayegukira amabanki. Mu rwandiko rwasohowe ku wa 15 z'ukw'icenda umwaka uheze wa 2019, buri shirahamwe ryategerezwa kuvunja amafaranga ryisunze igiciro cashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu "ritarengeje inyungu y'ibice 15%". Iyo ngingo isa n'iyagoranye gushira mu ngiro, ari co catumye mu kwezi kwa 11 umwaka uheze, BRB isohora itangazo, aho yagabisha ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column2: Burundi: Girumuco T√©line atambukira inzu y'imideli Yves St Laurent ati: 'Nakunze umudeli kubera dawe'
column3: Umurundikazi Girumuco T√©line F√©erie afitaniye amasezerano y'umudeli n'inzu rurangiranwa yo mu Bufaransa Yves Saint Laurent, avuga ko yabikunda kuva akiri umwana. Uwo mwigeme avuga ko yatanguye umwuga w'umudeli mu 2016 mu nzu [agence] yitwa Winners' fashion. Agira ati:" Nabikunze nkiri umwana. Ngira aho nabirabira cane hari ku muvyeyi wanje, dawe; yakora mu bintu vy'impuzu." Indoto za T√©line ngo zari izo kwambika abantu, agakora impuzu mu Burundi abantu ntibabe bakizikura mu mahanga. Uwo mwigeme yiga mu gisata co gutumatumanako amakuru ngo afise umugambi wo kuva muri ico gisata aje gutangura kwiga gushona imideli. Agitangura ivyerekeye imideli mu Burundi ngo abantu ntibabibona neza. Agira ati:" Abantu babona umenga ndiko ndata akaranga. Abavyeyi banje naragize Imana barantahura bakaza baranshigikira, ariko nk'abandi babibona mu mibano, ntibabibona neza, ariko ubu bariko barabitahura kubera babona urwego maze gushikako." Abandanya avuga ko akiri mu Burundi yagize ivyigwa nkarisha bwenge vyo gushona impuzu, abantu bakabifata nabi, kuko ntibatahura ingene yari azi ubwenge mw'ishure ariko akaja mu vyo gushona impuzu. Yaragira kandi n'ibindi vyigwa bijanye no gushona ku buhinga bwa internet, abamwigisha bakaba bari mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa. T√©line afise uburebure bwa metero 1.76, akaba apima ibiro 48. Atera akamo urwaruka na cane cane abigeme gukora cane kuko kenshi mu Burundi imyuga itamenyerewe badakunze kuyishigikira, bigasaba kugira inguvu nyinshi. Nta Mwuga Udakiza ni ikiganiro c'uruhererekane (Series) kizajya gihita kuri radio buri wa gatatu, no ku rubuga rwa BBC Gahuzamiryango. BBC Gahuzamiryango ihaye ikaze ibitekerezo vyanyu kuri iki kiganiro.

column2: Samuel Eto'o: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru yarokotse impanuka y'umuduga
column3: Samuel Eto'o, yatsindiye agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza w'Umunyafrika inshuro zine, yararusimvye mu mpanuka y'imodoka ejo ku wa Mungu. Bwana Eto'o w'imyaka 39, yari mu rugendo aja mu gisagara ca Douala, ca mbere mu bikorwa vy'ubutunzi muri Kameruni, nk'uko bitangazwa n'umuryango wiwe. Yari avuye mu muji wa Bafoussam, mu burengero bwa Kameruni, aho yari yitavye ibirori vy'isabukuru mu mpera z'indwi. Bivugwa ko umuduga wasovye umushoferi akagonga imiduga ibiri mu yari mu rukurikirane ruherekeje Eto'o. Uyu mugabo yahoze ari rutahizamu wa Barcelona,  ari kwa muganga, nk'uko bitangazwa n'umwe mu bo mu muryango wiwe. Umuvugizi wiwe yabwiye igisata ca BBC gitangaza mu rurimi rwa Pidgin, yuko Eto'o ameze neza kandi yuko umuduga wiwe wononekaye. column2: Burundi: OLUCOME iriyamiriza ingingo yo kwugara ibiryo vy'abavunjayi (bureau de change)
column3: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'itunga ry'igihugu, OLUCOME, aranegura ingingo y'Ibanki Nkuru y'u Burundi yo kwugara amazu adandaza amafaranga  mvamakungu. Mw'itangazo yasohoye kuri uyu wa kabiri, Gabriel Rufyiri arongoye Olucome avuga ko iyo ngingo itazotorera umuti ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafaranga mvamakungu cibonekeza mu gihugu. Ku wa 07 z'uku kwa kabiri, Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yarafashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga mvamakungu mu Burundi. Iyagiriza ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu, nk'uko BRB ibivuga. Mw'iryo tangazo, Bwana Rufyiri avuga ati: "Iyo ata mafaranga y'agaciro ahari, ingingo nk'iyo siyo iza gukemura ikibazo kuko ibiciro vy'amafaranga y'agaciro bivana n'ingene aboneka kw'isoko ryayo". Yibutsa ko iryo kena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro rituma ibidandazwa bimwe bimwe mu gihugu bikena kubera hakenerwa ayo mafaranga kugira ngo hagurwe ibikoresho nkenerwa mu guhingura ivyo bidandazwa. Atanga akarorero k'isima, amafanta, ibiyeri n'ibindi, avuga ko "iyo bibonetse usanga bigurishwa ku biciro vy'umurengera". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyarahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena. Leta y'u Burundi yagiye ifata ingingo mu ntumbero yo kugenzura ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga mvamakungu, ariko cagumye ari ikibazo ngorabahizi, arico catumyeIbanki Nkuru y'igihugu yugara amashirahamwe yose adandaza ayo mafaranga. Olucome isaba leta kuvyura imigenderanire n'ibihugu bitanga imfashanyo, kwongereza ibidandazwa bishorwa hanze, guhimiriza abarwizatunga b'banyamahanga kuzana imitahe yabo mu gihugu, kunagura igisata c'ingenzi, ivyo vyose kugira ngo amafaranga mvamakungu yinjire mu Burundi.

column2: Coronavirus - Burundi: Leta imenyesha ko hari abandi 20 banduye
column3: Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu n'ukurwanya SIDA mu Burundi bumenyesha ko hari abantu 20 babonywe ko banduye umugera coronavirus. Mw'itangazo bwaraye busohoye, ubwo bushikiranganji bumenyesha ko abo 20 bari mu bantu 98 bapimwe uwo mugera kuva ku wa 01 gushika ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu. Ibi biharuro bishasha bitangajwe inyuma y'aho ishirahamwe OLUCOME rimenyeshereje amakenga yaryo ku bijanye n'amakuru ashikirizwa na leta y'u Burundi kuri mugera uriko urakora ibara kw'isi yose. Nk'uko vyama, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu ntibutanga umwidondoro w'abo bantu bashasha banduye iyi ndwara ya Covid-19. Iryo tangazo rimenyesha ko mu bari basanzwe bakirwaye iyo ndwara bashika 29, 12 muri bo bapimwe bagasanga barakize, kandi ko baronkejwe uruhusha rwo gusubira mu miryango yabo. Gushika ubu, ibiharuro vyerekana ko abantu 83 aribo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera; muri abo 45 bakaba bamaze gukira, nayo 37 bakaba ari bo bakirwaye, umwe akaba yaritavye Imana. Gushika ubu, nta ngingo zirafatwa na leta y'u Burundi mu ntumbero yo kuzibira ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera nk'uko vyagenze mu bindi bihugu vyo mu karere. Hari bamwe babona ko amakuru atangwa na leta ku vyerekeye iyo ndwara yoba atajanye n'ukuri ku kungene yifashe mu gihugu. Ishirahamwe ryigenga OLUCOME ryiyemeje kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'ubutunzi bwa leta, riherutse gusohora itangazo aho rinegura leta ko ititayeho uko bikwiye ikiza ca Covid-19. Olucome yibaza ko amakuru atangazwa ashobora kuba ari kure y'ukuri kw'ivyo Abarundi bibaza, ikanasaba leta y'u Burundi kureka kwizimagiza imbere y'iki kiza kiriko kiriha inkumbi kw'isi. Mu minsi iheze hari amakuru yakwiriye ku mbuga ntangamakuru ko hari bamwe mu bategetsi muri leta y'u Burundi boba baranduye iyi ndwara, ibihakanwa n'umuvugizi wa leta. Ayo makuru akaba yakwiragiye inyuma y'aho umutambukanyi w'umukuru w'igihugu, Denise Nkurunziza agiriye muri Kenya kuvurwa indwara itaramenyekana gushika ubu. Vyaravuzwe cane ko yagiye i Nairobi kwivuza uwu mugera, ariko ayo makuru akaba yarahakanywe n'umwe mu bakozi bo mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu BBC yabajije ariko atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana . Umugera wa coronavirus watanguye kumenyekana mu mpera z'umwaka uheze mu gisagara ca Wuhan mu Bushinwa, ubu ukaba ubarizwa kw'isi yose. Ku wa 31 z'ukwezi kwa gatatu niho leta y'u Burundi yatangaza umuntu wa mbere yanduye uwo mugera.

column2: Ethiopia: Antony Blinken wa reta ya US baganiriye na Abiy Ahmed ku kibazo ca Tigray
column3: Umunyamabanga wa  reta ajejwe imigenderanire wa Reta zunze ubumwe za Amerika yaganiriye n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia ku kibazo ca Tigray. Antony Blinken yerekanye amakenga ku kungene ibintu vyifashe mu karere ka Tigray mu biganiro bagiranye na Abiy Ahmed. Blinken yahamagariye Abiy kureka imfashanyo zigashika muri ako karere mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ko abantu baguma bapfa. Yanavuze ko Amerika ishigikiye ibikwiye guhinduka muri Ethiopia hamwe n'amatora. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia yashimiye umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika "kuba bashigikiye ibiriko birahinduka muri Ethiopia kandi bakaba babibandanya ata kudebukirwa". Ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Abiy yagize ati: "Icipfuzo co gutsimbataza demokrasi no kwubaka igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro n'iterambere kuri bose, bishoboka biciye mu gutsimbataza ubucuti hagati ya Ethiopia na Amerika." Abasirikare bo mu karere ka Tigray batanye mu mitwe n'aba reta ya Ethiopia mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barahunze iyo ntara hanyuma amashirahamwe na yo atanga imfashanyo ntarashobora gushika muri ako karere.

column2: Nigeria: Umupasitori atangisha 700$ kugira yereke abantu 'irembo ribashikana mw‚Äôijuru‚Äô
column3: Umuvugabutumwa muri Nigeria ari mu yabira inyuma yo kubwira abantu ko azi irembo ribashikana mw'ijuru riri mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'ico gihugu, ariko ko kugira aribereke bategerezwa gutanga amafaranga. Pasitori Ade Abraham yarezwe mu gipolisi n'umwe mu banywanyi biwe avuga ko uyo mu pasitori yamutangishije 310.000 y'amanaira (amafaranga yo muri Nigeria), angana n'amadorari y'abanyamerika 750, kugira ngo bashobore kubona iryo rembo avuga ko riri mu gisagara ca Araromi-Ugbeshi, mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu muvugabutumwa yemereye BBC ko koko yabwiye abantu ivy'iryo rembo, akavuga ko ari "Imana akorera" yarimweretse mu ntumbero yo kuraba aho abanyashengero biwe bageza mu kwemera kwabo, ariko akavuga ko ata muntu n'umwe aramuha amafaranga. Ishirahamwe ry'Abakristu muri Nigeria ryasohoye itangazo ryikurako uyo mupasitori Ade Abraham, igipolisi co mu ntara ya Ekiti naco kikaba cegeranije inzandiko z'abanywanyi b'ishengero ryiwe, kikaba catanguye amatohoza. Ishengero rya Pasitori Ade Abraham ryahora rifise icicaro mu ntara ya Kogi, mu nyuma ryimukira mu ntara ya Kaduna, imbere y'uko ryimukira amaja mu bumanuko n'abanywanyi baryo, mw'ikambi yubatse mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu munyashengero yamureze ku gipolisi yaciye yisubirira muhira iwe i Kaduna kuva ico gihe, ariko umugore wiwe yaranse kumukurikira, akavuga ko "igihe c'umunezero" cari kigiye gushika vuba. Ariko uyu mugabo n'umugore badashaka ko amazina yabo amenyekana babwiye BBC ko babandanya bavugana kuri terefone umusi ku musi. Pasitori Ade, azwi kandi kw'izina rya Noah Abraham (Nowa Aburahamu), aherutse kwerekanwa mw'ireresi yazungurutse cane, aho yariko asaba abasenga Imana gutera akamo incuti zabo ziri mu mahanga gutanga intererano y'amafaranga mu rusengero rwiwe.

column2: Umushikiranganji w‚Äôikigega wa Afrika y‚ÄôEpfo asaba ko urucuruza rw‚Äôurumogi rwemerwa n‚Äôamategeko
column3: Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca leta ya Afrika y'Epfo,  Tito Mboweni, asaba leta y'ico gihugu ko urucuruza rw'urumogi rwemerwa n'amategeko kugira ngo amakori yiyongere. Yatangaje ivyo aciye ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter, aho yamenyesheje ko ico kibazo azogishikiriza mu nama y'abashikiranganji. Kuri urwo rubuga rwiwe, yashizeko n'isanamu yerekana ingene ico giterwa gitera gikura. Amategeko ya Afrika y'Epfo yari asanzwe avuga ko ukugurisha urumogi, uko rwoba rungana kwose biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Hagati aho, mu mwaka wa 2017, ico gihugu caremereye abantu gukoresha urumogi mu mihana iwabo, ariko nticarekuye kururima canke kurugurisha. Mu bihugu vyinshi vya Afrika, harimwo n'u Burundi n'u Rwanda, kurima, gukoresha canke kudandaza urumogi ntivyemewe n'amategeko kubera rufatwa nk'ikiyayuramutwe. Hagati aho, hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe birukoresha ku rugero runini. Muri ivyo harimwo igihugu ca Lesotho gisanzwe gikikujwe na Afrika y'Epfo, aho urumogi rurimwa ku rugero runini cane, rukaba rwemewe mu vyo ubuvuzi gusa. Mu myaka ya 2000, amakuru yavuga ko ibice 70% vy'urumogi rwagurishwa muri Afrika y'Epfo rwava muri ico gihugu ca Lesotho. Abarimyi bo mu gihugu ca Lesotho basanzwe barima urumogi mu ntumbero yo kurukoresha mu mihana iwabo, hamwe no kurugurisha hanze kubera ubukene basanzwe babamwo. Usanga abanyagihugu bato bato barima urumogi bakarurimana n'ibindi biterwa nk'ibigori kugira ngo barushore muri Afrika y'Epfo. Igihugu ca Zimbabwe naco nyene giherutse kwemera ko urumogi rushobora kurimwa rukimburwa muri ico gihugu, ni inyuma y'aho cemereye ikoreshwa ryarwo muvyo ubuvuzi n'ubushakashatsi mu 2018. Zambia yoyo iherutse gutangaza ko ubu vyemewe n'amategeko gutunganya urumogi no kururungika mu mahanga ku mpamvu z'urudandaza n'ubuvuzi. Leya y'ico gihugu yafashe ico cemezo mu nama yayo yabaye ku wa 04 z'ukwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze nk'uko vyatangajwe na Dora Siliya avugira leta. Ikindi gihugu gikoresha urumogi ku rugero runini cane ni Korea y'Uburaruko, aho mbere n'amashirahamwe ya reta aja kurugurisha mu bindi bihugu kugira baronke amahera y'agaciro. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko bitazwi neza ko hoba hariho amategeko abuza ikoreshwa ry'urumogi, kandi ico gihugu ntikibona ko ikoreshwa ry'urumogi ari ukurenga ku mategeko.

column2: Minembwe: FARDC ivuga ko ata mutwe n'umwe uzotunga ibirwanisho
column3: Tumaze iminsi tubabwira ku ngaruka z'ibitero vyagabwe ku mihana itandukanye yo muri territoire ya Minembwe muri Kivu y'epfo. Muri ako karere k'ubuseruko bwa Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo, imigwi ya Mai Mai Twirwaneho na Mai Mai Biloze Bishambuke isanzwe ishamiranye. Umuvugizi wa gisirikare muri ako gace, Major Dieudonne Kasereka, avuga ko abanyagihugu barenga 3000 bataye ingo zabo, ubu begeranirijwe mw'ikambi mfatakibanza iri ahitwa Baraka, aho barindiririye imfashanyo. Major Dieudonne Kasereka yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera wa BBC Gahuzamiryango, abanza kumubwira uko umutekano wifashe muri ako gace (umviriza ico kiganiro aho hejuru).

column2: Andy Mwag: Ivyo ndirimba muri 'Nisaidie Papa' vyambayeho
column3: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Andy Mwag, aheruka gusohora indirimbo ziryoheye ugutwi, avuga ko mu vyo aririmba harimwo ubuzima bubi yaciyemwo. Ni indirimbo zivanzemwo ikirundi, ikinyarwanda igifaransa, icongereza hamwe n'igiswahiri, vyumvikana ko zitondewe muri studio wumvirije ingene zivuga. Andy Mwaga, asanzwe yitwa Ndabaneze Andre, yatanguye kuririmba mu mwaka w'2007. Kuri ubu aba mu gihugu c'u Rwanda kuva mu 2015 akaba yubatse afise n'abana babiri. Igihe yatangura kuririmba, yatanguriye mw'isengero, hanyuma nk'uko avyivugira aca aja muri "bands zisanzwe", n'ukuvuga imigwi y'umuziki itaririmba indirimbo z'Imana. Wumvirije neza indirimwo za Andy Mwaga, nk'indirimbo Get There canke Amarira, wumva umudiho ukwibutsa abaririmvyi ba rurangiranwa nka Lokua Kanza wo muri Kongo canke Ismael Lo wo muri Senegal. Kanatsinda Andy Mwag we nyene arivugira ko Lokua Kanza ari mu baririmvyi bamuhaye ingoga zo kuririmba, anafatirako mu kwandika ibihangano vyiwe. Wumvirije indirimbo nyinshi zisohoka muri iki gihe yaba mu Burundi canke mu Rwanda, usanga ahanini zibanda ku mudiho utambika, indirimbo za Andy Mwaga ziruhura amaguru kuko uca wumva ushaka kwicara ukumviriza, zigashika ku mutima. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, Andy Mwaga avuga ko indirimbo yiwe ikunzwe Nisaidie Papa, yayanditse afatiye ku buzima bwiwe bwite. Nta vyinshi yabivuzeko ariko ababaye mu Burundi mu mpere y'imyaka y'1990, baribuka ko hibonekeje abana benshi bo mw'ibarabara ahanini kubera intambara. Ico gihe mu gisagara ca Bujumbura haradutse abana benshi baza barasaba mw'ibarabara uwo bahuye nawe wese, bavuga mu giswahili bati "Nisaidie papa" bisigura mu kirundi ngo "mfasha papa". Si kenshi mu karere haza abaririmvyi baririmba bigashika ku mutima, bazi umuziki (kuvuza ivyuma bitandukanye) kandi bafise igihagararo n'igikundiro. Niyabandanya ku murindi ariko, abakunzi b'umuziki nabo bakemera kumutiza ugutwi, nta nkeka ko Andy Mwaga ari mu bahagarariye kazoza keza k'umuziki wo mu Rwanda no mu Burundi.

column2: Greece: Umupatiri i Athens yafashwe inyuma y'uko ateye aside abasenyeri
column3: Umupatiri yahagaritswe ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubugiriki Athens/Ath√®nes inyuma yo gutera aside abasenyeri indwi bo mw'idini ry'aba Orthodox, nk'uko bivugwa n'igiporisi. Ibi vyabaye igihe uyu mupatiri w'imyaka 36 yariko yumvirizwa n'urwego rujejwe indero inyuma y'umutaga w'ejo ku wa gatatu, nk'uko bibandanya bivugwa n'igiporisi. Abasenyeri batatu bariko baravurirwa mu bitaro kubera ubushe batewe n'iyi aside, bakaba bahiye mu maso. Umuporisi yirutse aja gutabara abo basenyeri, na we nyene ari mu bitaro. Uwagirizwa gukora aka kabi - umupatiri ashobora kwirukanwa muri iryo dini - yagirizwa ko afise uruhara mu rudandaza rw'ibiyayuramutwe, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ANA. Nk'uko ibimenyeshamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu bibitangaza, abo basenyeri bari bakoranye kugira ngo baganire ingene bomwirukana - bakamwambura ubupatiri - inyuma y'aho bivugiwe ko mu kwa gatandatu mu 2018 yafatanywe amagarama 1,8 y'urumogi. Ikinyamakuru Ta Nea kivuga ko uyo mupatiri yinjiye mu kigo c'ababihebeye Imana ca Petraki kiri i Ath√®nes agiye kwumvirizwa, akaba yinjiranye "icupa rinini ririmwo iyo aside". Umuzamu yashoboye gufata uyo mupatiri ageze kw'irembo ry'ico kigo, na we nyene yaraturiwe n'iyo aside, akaba yaciye asimbanwa kwa muganga. Umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubugiriki Katerina Sakellaropoulou ariyamiriza iki gitero, nayo umushikiranganji wa mbere Kyriakos Mitsotakis akaba yavuganye n'uwurongoye iryo dini mu Bugiriki, Musenyeri mukuru wa Ath√®nes, Ieronymos II. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mitsotakis avuga ko ababajwe cane n'iki gitero, akaba yijeje uyu musenyeri ko "reta izokora uko ishoboye mu kuvura abakomeretse kugira bashobore gukira ningoga".

column2: Lady Gaga n'umufana bituye hasi bavuye hejuru ku butambiro i Las Vegas, batanguza imitwe
column3: Lady Gaga yaraguye atanguza umutwe amaguru aja hejuru agwa mu barorerezi mu giteramo giheruka mu muji wa Las Vegas. Uwo 'musani' yari yahamagaye umufana wiwe azwi nka Jack ngo aze ku butambiro, aca asimbira mu maboko yiwe - ariko uwo mufana abura intege bose baca batembera hasi. Umwe mu bariko bararorera igiteramo yanditse agira ati "n'ukuri twari tuzi yuko apfuye". Ahubwo Gaga yaciye agaruka ku butambiro aririmba indirimbo Million Reasons na Jack amuri impande. Yagize ati "Birahimbaye. Turakundana cane ku buryo twaguye twese tuva ku butambiro." "Twagwanye mu maboko. Turi nka Jack na Rose bo muri Titanic. "Ndibaza ko tuza gusangira icayi nyuma y'aha." Abafana bari bagize ubwoba bibaza ko Gaga yababaye kuko asanzwe afise uburwayi buzwi nka fibromyalgia, uburwayi amaranye igihe butuma ababara umubiri wose. Ubwo burwayi bushobora kandi gutuma ababa birengeje, akaruha, inyama z'umubiri zikagumirwa, kwibuka bikamugora kandi akabura itiro. Mu 2013, yahagaritse ibiteramo vy'urukurikirane Born This Way amaze kuvunika ikiyunguyungu. Ariko uwo muririmvyi kugwa kw'ejo kuwa kane ntaco kwamutwaye, ahumuriza abarorerezi hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano bamufashije guhaguruka. Kanda ngaha urabe ingene Lady Gaga n'umufana baguye Yagize ati: "Vyose ni sawa. Ikintu kimwe kitagenda ni uko dukeneye ingazi kuri ubu butambiro kugira nsubire hejuru." Uwo 'musani' yanahojeje Jack, yari yarenzwe n'umwosori kubera ivyari bihejeje kuba. Gaga yagize ati: "Ntugire ingorane, vyose ni sawa. Si ikosa ryawe. Urashobora kunyemerera ikintu? Urashobora kwibabarira ubu nyene kubera ibihejeje gushika?" Nyuma muri ico giteramo, Gaga yarerekanye yuko ukwo kugwa ata na kimwe kwamutwaye aca akora ikarasisi rikomeye ariko araririmba indirimbo yiwe ikunzwe, Bad Romance.

column2: Ni nde yanditse Bibiliya¬†?
column3: Na Edison Veiga BBC News Brazil Kuba Katolika, Bibiliya igizwe n‚Äôibitabo 73. Ku baporoti hari 66, nayo aba-orthodoxe bavuga ko hari 78. Ni mu gihe Abayahudi bemera ibitabo 39 gusa, ibi bikaba ari ivyo abakirisu bavuga ko ari ivyo mw‚Äôisezerano rya kera. Aha turiko tuvuga igitabo kigurishwa cane gusumba ibindi vyose muri kahise k‚Äôisi, Bibiliya Nyeranda, ikonganirizo ry‚Äôibitabo vyahinduwe mu ndimi zababa 3.000 ‚Äì aho ibirenga imiriyaridi 3.9 bimaze kugurishwa kw‚Äôisi yose, nk‚Äôuko bivugwa n‚Äôumuryango wa Bibliya wa Brezili (Soci√©t√© biblique du Br√©sil). Ariko none, ni¬†bande banditse ibi bitabo? Dufashe ko ari ibitabo vya kera cane, imbere y‚Äôuko abanditsi ba none batangura kwandika uko bandika, biragoye kuronkera iki kibazo inyishu nyayo. Intango y‚Äôiki kiyago ni ukubanza kumenya nimba ari ukugifatira ku bijanye n‚Äôidini gusa, canke nimba gikwiye gufatira ku buhinga n‚Äôubumenyi. Umuhinga mu vya kahise no mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana Gerson Leite de Moraes asanzwe yigisha kuri kaminuza Mackenzie Presbyterian University avuga ati: "Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kubera hari imbono zibiri. Imbono ya mbere ishingiye ku kwemera Imana gushingiye ku masengero, aha tukaba dufise abiga ibijanye no kwemera Imana kubera bashaka kuba abapasitori/abapatiri mu muryango kanaka, imbono kama¬†¬ª. Kubw‚Äôiwe, inyigisho z‚Äôamasabamana ziganisha ku busaseredoti/ubupasitori, zitegerezwa ¬´¬†kugendera ku nyigisho z‚Äôuko ivyanditswe vyavugishijwe, ni ukuvuga ko ari ivyavuzwe n‚ÄôImana yo nyene ubwayo, iciye kuri Mutima Mweranda/Mpwemu Yera¬†¬ª. Avuga ati¬†: "Ku rundi ruhande, inyigisho ku bijanye no kwemera Imana zishingiye ku buhinga ntizirajwe ishinga n‚Äôiyo mbono, ahubwo zozo zirondera kwihweza uko izi nyandiko zaje ufatiye ku bihe vya kahise¬†¬ª. Muri iyi nzira, turashobora gutahura ibitabo vya mbere vya Bibiliya, ibigize vya bitabo bitanu vya mbere bizwi nka Pentateuque (canke nka Torah y‚ÄôAbayahudi), ko ari icegeranyo c‚Äôinyandiko zanditswe ubwa mbere imyaka hafi 1.000 imbere y‚Äôumuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Ibi ni Amamuko/Itanguriro, Ihunga, Abalewi, Guharura/Kubara  hamwe na Gutegeka kwa Kabiri¬† (Deuteronome)¬† - ibitabo bivuga ivyerekeye kuva kw‚Äôirema ry‚Äôisi gushika ku rupfu rwa Musa. Kubera ari ivya kera, abahinga bavuga ko bigoye kumenya neza na neza abavyanditse. Kubw‚Äôamayagwa y‚Äôidini, ibi bitabo bitanu vyanditswe n‚Äôumuntu umwe, Musa. Jos√© Luiz Goldfarb, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Katorika y‚Äôi S√£o Paulo akaba arongoye n‚Äôigisata c‚Äôimico y‚Äôikiyahudi mu murwi A Hebraica, avuga ati¬†: "Nsomye nkongera nkavugana n‚Äôumusiguzi akongera akaba n‚Äôumukinyi w‚Äôivyese, Haroldo de Campos (1929-2003), nahakuye icigwa ko hari inzira zibiri zishoboka. Iyo yo mw‚Äôisinagoga ivuga ko Musa ari we yanditse Torah. Tubifata nk‚Äôuko twama ‚Äòtwumviriza‚Äô Musa buri ndwi [ibisomwa], kandi ibi bifise agaciro mu mico y‚Äôabantu¬†¬ª. Ihengama ry‚Äôabahinga ntiryemera ibivugwa ko ibi bitabo vyanditswe n‚Äôumuntu umwe. Ati¬†: "Ku bijanye n‚Äôinyigisho za Bibiliya, tuvuga ibitabo vyanditswe mu myaka irenga 600¬†¬ª. "Uku niko umwihwezo wa Harold urangira hampande y‚Äôubushakashatsi yagize kuri Bibiliya, kubisigarira vy‚Äôivya kera (archeoloie), ku bisigarira no ku nzandiko zo guhayagiza¬†¬ª. Avuga ko umwihwezo wimbitse w‚Äôizi nzandiko ufasha kubitadukanya ufatiye ku nyubako, amajambo azigize, n‚Äôibirimwo ufatiye ku banditsi mu bihe bitandukanye vyo muri kahise. Ni iciyumviro cemerwa neza. Uri Lam wo mu muryango Templo Beth-El w‚Äôabanya-Israel muri S√£o Paulo asigura ati: "Biragoye cane kuvuga ivy‚Äôibihe canke abanditsi kuko umuntu atakara. Amatohoza y‚Äôabahinga yemeza ko izi nyandiko zifise imyaka iri hagati ya 2.700 na 3.000 canke gusumba aho kubera vyahererekanwa ku munwa¬†¬ª. Kubw‚Äôiwe, izo nyandiko zaratagatifujwe ‚Äì ni ukuvuga ko zegeranijwe hanyuma zifatwa ko ari izigize Bibiliya y‚ÄôAbahebreyi‚Äì amaja mu kinjana ca IV imbere y‚Äôumuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Lam yemera ati¬†: "Ariko n‚Äôaho nyene, hari impari nyinshi, kandi ntidushobora kurangiza iki kibazo¬†¬ª. Goldfarb abona akarusho muri ibi vyo gufatira hamwe izi nyandiko hamwe no kuzifatira mu mice itandukanye. Yibaza ati¬†: "Nimba ari inyandiko zamaze imyaka 600, ibi ni vyiza ku bantu bakunda ibikorwa. Ni bangahe bashoboye gusohora inyandiko mu karere kamwe canke akandi¬†?¬†¬ª. Muri ico gihe nyene ivy‚Äôabanditsi bitandukanye n‚Äôivy‚Äôubu, ingorane nk‚Äôizi nyene zo kumenya koko uwanditse zirabandanya mu bindi bitabo biri muri Bibiliya y‚ÄôAbayahudi ‚Äì ikonganirizo ry‚Äôibitabo bigize isezerano rya kera muri bibliya ya gikirisu. Goldfarb¬†ati: "Nk‚Äôakarorero, zaburi za Dawudi. Ni agatabo gato abantu bakoresha cane mu bisabisho n‚Äôindirimbo vya misi yose kegeranya indirimbo Dawudi yakunda kuririmba mw‚Äôisinagoga. "Tuvuga ko yari umuririmvyi kandi ko ibi bisabisho vyaririmbwa. Ni nde abizi¬†? Ni ikibazo ciza:¬† ku vyo nize ngasoma, jewe ntavyo nokwemeza‚Ä¶¬†¬ª. Moraes¬†nawe ati: "Ikiri ukuri ni uko habaye benshi banditse ibiri muri Bibiliya¬†¬ª. "Igishoboka cane ni uko inkuru ziri mu vyanditswe muri bibiliya muri kino gihe imbere y‚Äôaha vyahanahanwa ku munwa igisekuru ku kindi. Kandi iri ryagumye ari itunga karanga ry‚Äôidini ry‚Äôaba bantu¬†¬ª. Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza ati: "Ni ukumenya kandi ko ivyo abitirirwa inyandiko mu gihe ca kera bitandukanye n‚Äôivyo dufise ubu. Ico gihe, vyari bikunze kuba ko inyandiko kanaka yitirirwa umutware mukuru, umutegetsi akundwa, umuntu akomeye¬†¬ª. Aha niho rero, abanywanyi b‚Äôinyigisho zimwe zimwe, iyo bahinduye ivyo bazi bakabishira mu nyandiko, bakunda kuzitunganya nk‚Äôuko umengo ni ikintu canditswe na ba shebuja. Moraes¬† yongerako ati¬†: "Kubiraba Torah, ushaka kuvuga ko izi nzandiko zanditswe na Musa? Bishobora kuba atari vyo. Kumbure afise kuba yarabigizemwo uruhara. Hari bamwe bavuga ko ata ruhara na rutoya yagize. "Ariko ni inyandiko zitirirwa Musa." Kubw‚Äôiwe, igikenewe ni uko izi nyandiko nyeranda birangira zitiriwe amadini. Moraes yibaza ko ari ibintu vyumvikana ko ibitabo vyeranda vyanditswe, nk‚Äôakarero, inyuma y‚Äôishingwa ry‚Äôigihugu ca Israel gusumba ibihe bivugwamwo, nk‚Äôibijanye n‚Äôihunga ry‚ÄôAbayahudi bava mu Misiri, barongowe na Musa. Ati: "Iyumvire igico c‚Äôabantu bayerera mu bugaragwa. Ivyo kwicara ngo bandike si vyo bibaraza ishinga. Ikiraje ishinga uwuriko arayerera mu bugaragwa ni ukurondera ingene abaho. Mu myaka itari mike, vyabaye ngombwa ko bategura intambara kugira ngo baronke ubutaka‚Ä¶nta n‚Äôumwe yari anezwe ivyo kwandika ibitabo." Uyu mushakashatsi ati: "Ikintu kinini gishoboka, ni uko ibi vyagiye kuba hashinzwe umuryango wiyubatse neza." Ariko zari inkuru zidakomeye cane, z‚Äôubwoko butandukanye, vyarangiye zegeranijwe zigashirwa ¬†hamwe n‚Äôumwanditsi umwe canke benshi. Umuhinga mu nyandiko nyeranda, Thiago Maerki akaba n‚Äôumushakashatsi kw‚Äôishure kaminuza rya S√£o Paulo (Unifesp), akaba kandi ari mw‚Äôishirahamwe Hagiography Society, muri Amerika, arashima cane iciyumviro co gukoresha ubumenyi bwa none mu vy‚Äôindimi mu kugerageza gushira hamwe canke gutandukanya inyandiko zigize Bibiliya. Kubw‚Äôiwe, abanditsi nk‚Äôumwigisha wa kaminuza Robert Alter, umunyamerika yigisha kw‚Äôishure kaminuza ya California, "babivuga neza ", nk‚Äôigihe avuga ko ari vyiza "gukoresha uburyo bumwe bumwe bukoreshwa mu kwiga ibijanye n‚Äôivya kahise k‚Äôindimi n‚Äôinyandiko mu kwiga inyandiko za Bibiliya". Maerki¬†ati: "Arihweza ubuhinga bw‚Äôinyandiko, impinyanyuro z‚Äôamajambo yakoreshejwe, ubudasa mu gushikiriza ivyiyumviro, imyumvikano ikurikizwa mu bwoko bumwe bumwe bw‚Äôinyandiko ya Bibiliya, na buri mwanditsi. "Igihe cose kugira ngo ntihabe kuzana ivyataye igihe." Indinganizo y‚Äôamayagwa nayo nyene ishobora kwisungwa mu mwihwezo w‚Äôibitabo bine vy‚Äôinjili, ibitabo bivuga ubuzima bwa Yezu, bikaba vyitirirwa Matayo, Mariko, Luka na Yohani. Umushakashatsi kuri kahise k‚Äôidini rya Gikristu kw‚Äôishure kaminuza Universit√© pontificale gr√©gorienne i Rome akongera akaba n‚Äôumuhinga ku bijanye na Vaticano Mirticeli Medeiros, arabishingira intahe ko, ata gukekeranya, abanditse ibi bitabo bine ari abo bagabo bane. Asigura ati¬†: "Ku vy‚ÄôInjili, nta mpari zihari [kuba zitirirwa], n‚Äôimiburiburi ufatiye ku bushakashatsi bwa vuba. Aha ni ukwibuka ko babiri mu banditsi bazo, Matayo na Yohani, bari abatumwa ba Yezu/Yesu. Aba bandi babiri, Mariko na Luka, ku ruhande rwabo, bateguye inyandiko zabo bisunze ivyo abatumwa bashingiye intahe." Maerki arasangamwo ubudasa mu mpinyanyuro z‚Äôamajambo muri ibi bitabo bine. Asigura ati¬†: "Matayo afatwa nk‚Äôumwanditsi adakoresha impinyanyuro itaziguye, akoresha impinyanyuro isanzwe. Yohani akoresha ururimi rugoye, rwuzuye imizunguruko, imvugo ngereranyo. Luka akoresha imvugo inonosoye, ihanitse." Nimba mw‚Äôisezerano rya kera hari ibibazo vyinshi gusumba ibizwi ku bijanye n‚Äôabitirirwa ibitabo, inyandiko zo mw‚Äôisezerano rishasha, n‚Äôaho ari iza vuba kandi n‚Äôabazitirirwa bavugwa hafi muri zose, naho nyene harimwo ibibazo. Birazwi ko bimwe muri vyo vyatanguye kwandikwa imyaka 30 canke 40 inyuma y‚Äôurupfu rwa Yezu. Moraes avuga ko "bishoboka cane ko aya mazina yose [y‚Äôaba banditsi b‚ÄôInjili bane] yaje biciye mu mico n‚Äôimigenzo." Ashimangira ati¬†: "Nta zina ry‚Äôumuntu yitirirwa ibi bitabo vya kera cane." Igisa n‚Äôuko ata mpari gitera ni uko iya mbere muri izi njili ari iya Mariko. Ati: "Mu gihe hari igisekuru, igisekuru cakurikiranye ubuzima bwa Yezu gushika apfe, ni ngombwa ko kigumana inyandiko ku vyabaye. Rero nico gitangura ubwoko bushasha bw‚Äôimpinyanyuro y‚Äôamajambo, ari yo Njili." Mu gushira hamwe imico n‚Äôimigenzo hamwe n‚Äôivyahanahanwa ku munwa, uyu mwanditsi w‚Äôinjili arandika neza ivy‚Äôubuzima bwa Yezu. Ariko ahagarara cane ku gice yashaka guhagararako ico gihe: aha ni ukuvuga ko ata kigoro agira ko kuvuga ku vyerekeye ivuka canke ubwana bwa Yezu, ahagarara cane cane ku gikorwa ciwe, ku rupfu rwiwe, ku butumwa bwiwe bwa Pasika. None uyu Mariko yari umuntu ki¬†? Umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana (th√©ologien) arerekana ko yari umwigishwa w‚Äôintumwa Petero. Ati: "Ariko abandi bazokubwira ko yari umwigishwa wa Paulo. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ico tuzi ni uko atari umwigishwa wa Yezu." Injili ya Yohani nayo nyene irimwo amakenga. Ahari amakenga ni aho avuga  ¬´umwigishwa yakundwa cane¬ª, aha amayagwa akerekana ko yari Yohani. Moraes ati¬†: "Ariko hariho abahinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana babona ahubwo ko yashobora kuba ari Lazaro, kuko mu njili harimwo umurongo [mu gice kivuga urupfu rwa Lazaro] uvuga ko Yezu yarize, ¬†‚Äòhanyuma raba ingene yamukunda." Mu kinjana ca 20 ni ho abakristu batanguye kmwemeza ko Yohani ari we yanditse iyi Njili. "Amayagwa yabigize uko nyene, tubandanya tumwita Yohani. Ariko ntivyoroshe kumenya uwayanditse, ishobora mbere kuba yanditswe n‚Äôumurwi wa benshi." Kubw‚Äôuyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana, ni vyiza ko tugumana iciyumviro c‚Äôuko ari ¬´¬†Injili zanditswe na¬ª ugaca ushirako izina rimwe rimwe muri ayo, hakubafata nk‚Äôabanditsi b‚Äôibitabo nk‚Äôuko bafatwa mu gihe ca none. Ariko nimba ikibazo ari Isezerano rishasha, ni ukwerekana uruhaha rwa Paulo, intumwa yandikiye amabaruwa menshi imiryango ya mbere ya gikristu. Medeiros avuga ati¬†: "Amabaruwa ya Paulo, nk‚Äôuko iri zina ribivuga, [yanditswe] na Paulo hamwe n‚Äôabigishwa biwe. Nk‚Äôakarorero, ibaruwa ryandikiwe Timoteyo, rishobora kuba ryanditswe na Paulo, rero abahinga bamwe baryita Deut√©ro-Paulin". "Hagati aho, hari impari ku vyerekeye amabaruwa yitirirwa Petero, kandi ashobora kuba atanditswe na we nyene ubwiwe. Co kimwe kandi n‚Äôirya Paulo yandikiye abahebreyi, rishobora cane kuba ryagiye kurangizwa n‚Äôumwe mu bigishwa biwe¬†¬ª. Paulo yumvikana ko ari we yatanguye kwandika kuri Yezu, kuva mu mwaka wa 57 canke 58. Moraes¬† avuga ati¬†: "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya nimba yari azi ko yariko yandika inyandiko nyeranda. Ashobora kuba atari abizi." "Hari uburyo yakoresha mu kuvugana n‚Äôamasengero hanyuma agasiga amakete. Amwe muri yo yaratakaye, amwe muyo twita ko ari amabaruwa yiwe yanditswe kumbure n‚Äôabigishwa biwe, ariko ashirwa mu murwi w‚Äôayanditswe na Paulo." Uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana avuga ati: "Iyo tuvuga amabaruwa ya Petero, kumbure yanditswe n‚Äôabamwegereye, kuko Petero ntiyari azi kwandika, kandi arabitomora mw‚Äôibaruwa ryiwe [rya mbere].¬† Yakoresha umwanditsi mu kwandika. Kumbure afise kuba yabwira icegera ciwe, yitwa Silvano, ivyo yandika."

column2: Funke Abimbola: ‚ÄòIzina ryanje ry‚Äôikinyafrika ryambujije kuronka akazi‚Äô
column3: Umunyamategeko akongera akaba n'umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira bw'inkehwa, Funke Abimbola,  avuga ko "yamye arenganywa" igihe cose yagerageje kurondera akazi. Hafi icagatatu c'ama kompanyi 100 adandaza imitahe (FTSE) nta nkehwa afise mu nzego zifata ingingo, nk'uko icegeranyo kibivuga. Ikigo kijejwe kwihweza ingene ubwoko buserukiwe mu ma kompanyi atandukanye, Parker Review Committee, mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza, kimenyesha ko inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo mu makompanyi atari make. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Nahuye n'inzitizi nyinshi  igihe nariko ndondera akazi kubera nari mfise izina ry'ikinyafirika, kandi kubera ndi umwirabure, nta gukekeranya". Yabwiye BBC ko yaterefonye incuro zirenga ijana kugira ngo ashobore guhonyoza ikirenge  mu kazi. Ati: "Baranyinuvye, barankarira cane gusumba abandi  kubera kwitwa umugore w'umwirabure". "Biroroshe kukubona uwo uri we kandi biroroshe cane rwose kukurenganya iyo uri mu nkehwa". Icegeranyo c'ikigo Parker Review Committee  cerekana ko mu makompanyi adandaza imitahe ashika 250 casanze inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, aho 119 kuri 179 amoko adaserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Ico cegeranyo ntikintangaza. Hari inzitizi nyinshi  cane kugira ngo inkehwa zishobore kuronka ikibanza mu nzego zo hejuru". Ico kigo Parker Review Committee cashinzwe kugira ngo gikore ubushakashatsi ku kungene amoko atandukanye aserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo  mu makompanyi atandukanye, casohoye icegeranyo caco kuri ico kibazo mu 2017. Ico gihe, mu makompanyi 51 kw'ijana adandaza imitahe inkehwa ntizari ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, ugereranije n'ubu ari 33%. Ico cegeranyo gisaba ko gushika mu 2021 buri kompanyi mu makompanyi 100 ya FTSE yoba ifise n'imiburiburi indongozi imwe iva mu nkehwa, hanyuma gushika mu 2024 naho mu makompanyi 250 ya FTSE yoba yamaze gukora gutyo. Mu ntumbero yo gufasha kugira ngo inkehwa ziserukirwe, ico cegeranyo gisaba ko buri kompanyi yokwama itanga icegeranyo c'ingene inkehwa ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, n'ingene ubwoko butandukanye buserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola arizeye ko mu gihe hoba integuro yoha ibibanza kanaka inkehwa vyofasha mu gutorera inyishu ico kibazo. Ati: "Hariho amashirahamwe makeya mu Bwongereza aha akazi amoko atandukanye. "Ayo mashirahamwe yama ategura intonde z'abantu bafise ubuhinga butandukanye muy bwoko butandukanye buri mwaka, rero iyo wipfuza kurondera abirabure, abanyaziya hamwe n'inkehwa, biba ngombwa ko uja kuronderera muri izo ntonde". Umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, Andrea Leadsom, avuga ko ico cegeranyo cerekana ko "amakompanyi agifise igikorwa kitari gito" kugira ngo ashobore guhimiriza abakozi b'abirabure, Abanya Aziya hamwe n'inkehwa.

column2: Vatican: Kardinali Becciu yategetswe gutanga imihoho, ibitari bimenyerewe
column3: Umukardinali yari mu bari bafise amabanga akomeye i Vaticano kwa Papa, Giovanni Angelo Becciu, yatanze imihoho giturumbuka ariko akavuga ko yategetswe na Papa Francis. Avuga ko yiketswe gukoresha umutungo wa Ekleziya yihera benewabo, agahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Kardinali Becciu yari umwe mu begereye cane Papa, akaba yarigeze kuba ajejwe amabanga mu bunyamabanga bwa leta ya Vaticano. Yagiye kugira uruhara mu masezerano yateye impari yo gushora imitahe mu nyubakwa nziza ya Londres mu mafaranga ya Ekleziya. Iki gikorwa kuva ico gihe kiriko kirakorwako amatohoza. Ntibikunze kuboneka aho abantu bo ku rwego rwo hejuru i Vaticano batanga imihoho, kandi na Vaticano nta vyinshi yabivuzeko mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa kane. Ariko uyu mu kardinali w'imyaka 72 yabwiye ikinyamakuru co ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi Domani co mu Butaliyano ko yategetswe gutanga imihoho kuko yiketswe ko yahaye benewabo amafaranga ya Ekleziya. Avuga ati: "Nta n'urufaranga na rumwe jewe nigeze niba. Nta matohoza ndiko ndakorwako, ariko ari nka hamwe bonshira imbere y'ubutungane, nokwisigura". Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru yagiye gushikiriza mu nyuma, uyu mukardinali avuga ko ibogozwa ryiwe ryabaye giturumbuka. Avuga ko na Papa "atari agononokewe" igihe yatangaza iyi nkuru. Ati: "Ni ibisigabwenge. Gushika ejo‚Ä¶niyumvira ko nari umugenzi pfa mpfe wa Papa, intumwa yiwe y'umwizigirwa". "Mu nyumn rero niho Papa yambwira ko atakinyizeye kuko yaronse amakuru yahawe n'abacamanza bamubwira ko nakoze icaha co kunyuruza umutungo". Kardinali Becciu ashimangira ko habaye "ukutumvikana", akongera kandi ati: "Nditeguye gusigurira Papa vyose. Nta caha na kimwe nakoze". Uyu mukardinali Giovanni Angelo Becciu ni umutaliyano yamaze imyaka ya mbere akora mu gisata kijejwe imigenderanire i Vaticano. Papa Francis niwe yamugize umukardinali mu 2018, igihe aherewe amabanga mashasha yo kurongora igisata kijejwe ibijanye n'ubweranda. Yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano avuga ati: "Ni uruhombo kuri jewe, umuryango wanje, abanyagihugu b'igihugu canje. Navyemeye ku bugamburutsi n'urukundo mfitiye Ekleziya na Papa". N'aho mu vyo yagirijwe harimwo ibijanye n'amasezerano ajanye n'inyubakwa ya Londres ivugwa ko yaguzwe mu mutungo wa Ekleziya, Kardinali Becciu wewe siko abibona. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa gatanu, uyu mukardinali yavuze ko Papa yamwagirije ko yakoresheje nabi umutungo wa Ekleziya akawushira mu ma koperative n'urucuruza vya benewabo. Ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano kandi bivuga ko Papa atanezerejwe n'ingene imperezwa yo gufashisha abakene yiswe Peter's Pence yagiye gukoreshwa mu bindi bitari biyigenewe. Kardinali Becciu azobandanya afise iki giti n'aho yatanze imihoho. Hagati aho, nta ruhara azogira mu gutora uwundi mu Papa.

column2: DR Congo: Tshisekedi yababariye abagabo babiri bagize uruhara mw'iyicwa rya Perezida Laurent Kabila
column3: Abagabo babiri bagiriwe n'icaha co kwica uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, Laurent-D√©sir√© Kabila haraciye imyaka 20, bahawe ikigongwe. N'aho Perezida Kabila yarashwe n'uwamucungerera ubuzima, babiri mu bategetsi biwe bo hejuru, Koroneri Eddy Kapend na Georges Leta, baragize uruhara mw'iryo gandagurwa. Mu kwa gatandatu kw'umwaka uheze, Perezida F√©lix Tshisekedi yagabanije igihano c'urupfu bari baciriwe. Iki kigongwe gitanzwe mu gihe hari ukutumvikana hagati ya Perezida Tshisekedi n'uwo yasubiriye, umuhungu wa Laurent Kabila ari we Joseph Kabila. Joseph Kabila yafashe ubutegetsi inyuma y'urupfu rwa se wiwe mu 2001, akaba yarongoye DR Congo mu kiringo c'imyaka 18 imbere y'uko Perezida Tshisekedi atsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2018. N'aho bwari bwo bwa mbere habaye uguhererekana ubutegetsi mu mahoro kuva mu myaka hafi 60 yari iheze, abatari bake mu bafise uruhara mu buzima bwa politike ya Congo bariyamirije ivyavuye muri ayo matora. Hari benshi bazi ko uyu mukuru w'igihugu mushasha yagiranye amasezerano yo mu mpisho na Joseph Kabila, gushika n'ubu agifise inguvu nyinshi mu gihugu. Giscard Kusema, umwe mu bajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ko Koroneri Kapend hamwe na bamwe mu bo bapfunganywe "baronse ico kigongwe c'umukuru w'igihugu..ikaba ari ingingo iraba benshi ata nkunzi". Koroneri Kapend yari umwishikira cane kwa Perezida Laurent Kabila. Sentare yasanze ari we yateguye igandagurwa ryiwe, afatanije n'abandi bari bajejwe umutekano w'uyo yahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu, harimwo mbere n'uwari ajejwe ibiro vy'igendereza ico gihe,  Georges Leta. Bompi barahakana ko ata ruhara babigizemwo. Iki kigongwe gitanzwe inyuma y'indwi nkeya Perezida Tshisekedi asambuye ihuriro ryiwe n'umugambwe wa Kabila usanzwe ari wo wiganje mu nama nshingamateka, inyuma y'umwaka wose barabana urunuka. Muri kino gihe, Perezida Tshisekedi ariko arondera urundi runani rwomutuma agira inguvu zikwiye mu nama nshingamateka. Laurent-D√©sir√© Kabila yari yafashe ubutegetsi ku wa 17 z'ukwa gatanu 1997, atembagaje intwaro ya Mobutu Sese Seko Kuku Ngbendu Wa Za Banga mu ntambara yamaze amezi hafi indwi, afashijwe n'ingabo cane cane z'u Rwanda, Uganda na Angola, maze  yomora uyu mukuru w'igihugu citwa Zaire ico gihe yari amaze imyaka ishika 32 agitwaza umukazo. Ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Kabila ntibworohewe kuko haciye imisi mike imigenderanire hagati yiwe na bamwe mu bamufashije gufata ubutegetsi, u Rwanda na Uganda, yaratitutse bituma haduka intambara ya kabiri mu 1998, intambara ivugwa ko yagizwemwo uruhara n'ibihugu icenda, harimwo Zimbabwe, Angola na Namibia vyagiye kumufasha kurwanya abari bateye igihugu ciwe. Yagiye kugandagurwa ku wa 16 z'ukwa mbere 2001, amaze imyaka itatu n'amezi hafi umunani, maze inama nshingamateka ica yemeza ko umuhungu wiwe,  Joseph Kabila, yomusubirira. Joseph Kabila nawe yagiye kuva ku butegetsi atsinzwe muri ayo matora yo mu 2018, amatora yabayemwo impari, akiyamirizwa na bamwe mu batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwa Kabila, cane cane  Martin Fayulu avuga ko ari we yayatsinze ariko akanyarwa intsinzi.

column2: Diego Maradona: Menya ubuhinga bw'uyu mukinyi n'intege nke ziwe
column3: Igitangaza c'umukinyi, agaragara mu kibuga, umuhinga, ntagereranywa, adahuriweko na bose. Diego Maradona. Igihangange mu mupira w'amaguru ateye inkeke. Umwe mu bakinyi b'ibihangange muri uwo mukino, uwo munya Argentine yarishimira uko ahererekanya umupira, ukubona kure n'ubunyarutsi vyashimisha abakunzi biwe. Yaranashavuje abakunzi biwe igihe yinjiza n'ukuboko, mu ciswe 'Hand of God' (ukuboko kw'Imana), aca aja muvyo kunywa ibiyayuramutwe no mu zindi ngorane zimuraba ku giti ciwe atari ku kibuga. Diego Armando Maradona yavukiye mu micungararo  y'igisagara ca Buenos Aires haraciye imyaka 60, akaba yakize ubukene buharangwa mu kuba umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru rurangiranwa bamwe bagereranya mbere ko yasumvya ubuhinga Pele wo muri Brezil. Uwo munye Argentine, yinjije ibitsindo 259 mu nkino 491, yararushije amajwi mugenzi we wo muri Amerika y'epfo mu matora y'umukinyi wa mbere akomeye mu kinjana ca 20, imbere y'uko FIFA ihindura uburyo batoramwo, bose bakaba baciye bagirwa aba mbere. Maradona yerekanye ubushobozi butangaje kuva akiri muto, aho yagejeje umurwi wiwe w'abakiri bato wa Los Cebollitas, ku ntsinzi 136 bikurikiranya, aca agira ugukina umupira w'amaguru umwuga ku myaka 16 n'imisi 120. Mugufi kandi yitsindagiye, ku metero imwe n'igice, si umunonotsi wokwiyumviriye. Ububangutsi bwiwe, ukubona kure, guhagarika umupira, ugucenga no guhereza vyatuma ukutanyaruka cane n'iyongerekana ry'ibiro vyiwe bitagaragara. Ashobora kuba yari umuhinga mu guca mu bakinyi binyuma bahanganye, ariko vyaramugora kwirinda ingorane. Ibitsindo 34 vya Maradona mu nkino 91 za Argentine ni igice kimwe muri kahise kiwe mu gihe yamaze akina. Yarafashije igihugu ciwe gutahukana intsinzi mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi co mu 1986 i Mexico, aranagishikana mu rukino rwa nyuma inyuma y'imyaka ine yakurikiye. Mu nkino z'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma zaheruka, hari habayemwo ukutumvikana kwari gushobora kugira ingaruka ku buzima bwiwe. Urukino rwabahuje n'Ubwongereza na rwo rwadutsemwo ikindi cuka kibi, intambara ya Falklands War hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri yari yatanguye  imyaka ine imbere y'aho. Ku kibuga ho yaciye ikomera gusumba. Mu gihe hari haheze iminota 51 ata gitsindo kiraboneka, Maradona yarwaniye umupira mu kirere n'umunyegoli Peter Shilton aca yinjiza igitsindo. Mu nyuma yavuze ko ico gitsindo cabonetse "hamwe kivuye ku mutwe wa Maradona, ahandi na ho ku kuboko kw'Imana". Inyuma y'iminota ine, yaciye yinjiza igitsindo  kivugwa ko ari "igitsindo c'ikinjana' - yafashe umupira hagati mu kibuga aca arawirukankana, asiga abandi bakinyi inyuma, imbere yo gucenga Shilton, aca arinjiza. Ku ncuro zibiri zose, Maradona yaraguzwe ku giciro kitari bwigere kibaho ku wundi mukinyi  - ava muri Boca Juniors mu gihugu ciwe agana Barcelone muri Espagne ku miliyoni 3 z'amapawundi, n'igihe yaja mu Butaliyano mu murwi wa Napoli, inyuma y'imyaka ibiri ku  miliyoni 5 z'amapawundi. Hari abakunzi b'uwo mugwi barenga 80.000 ku kibuga ca San Paolo, igihe yashika ari muri kajugujugu. Intwari nshasha. Yarakinye mu murwi ukomeye mu Butaliyano, arakundwa n'abarorerezi mu gihe yafasha gutahukana ibikombe vy'ihiganwa rya Buraya mu 1987 na 1990 hamwe n'igikombe ca UEFA co mu 1989. Yaragiriraniye ubucuti n'imirwi y'abicanyi ya Camorra, aja muvyo kunywa ibiyayuramutwe vya cocaine, aranitwarirwa yagirizwa kutemera umwana yavyaye. Inyuma yo gutsindwa igitsindo 1-0 n'Ubudagi mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi mu 1990 mu Butaliyano, ibipimo vyerekanye ko yanyoye ibiyayuramutwe mu mwaka wakurikiye vyatumye ahagarikwa amezi 15. 1977: Yatanguye mu rukino rwahuza Argentine v Hongrie 1982: Yagiye mu murwi wa Napoli inyuma y'imyaka ibiri yamaze muri Barcelone 1986: Yatahukanye igikombe c'isi akinira Argentine 1990: Yakinye urukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi ubugira kabiri akinira Argentine, maze itahukana ikibanza ca kabiri. Atwara n'igikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo akinira Napoli. 1991: Yahagaritswe amezi 15 inyuma yo gusanga yafashe ibiyayuramutwe. 1994: Yakinye mu gikombe c'isi incuro ya kane ariko aca arirukanwa inyuma yo gusanga yafashe ibiyayuramutwe. 1997: Yarasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru inyuma yo gusanga yafashe ibiyayuramutwe ubugira gatatu. 2010: Yahejeje ikiringo ciwe co kumenyereza umurwi wa Argentine inyuma yo gutsindwa mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi. Inyuma y'ibipimo bigira gatatu vyemeza ko yafashe ibiyayuramutwe inyuma y'imyaka itatu, yarasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru afise imyaka 37, ariko abandanya agira n'izindi ngorane. Maradona yaraciriwe urubanza rwo gupfungwa imyaka 2 n'amezi 10 ariko yidegemvya azira kurasa abamenyeshamakuru n'inkoho ikoreshwa mu gukina. Akamenyero kiwe ka cocaine n'akaborerwe vyamuteye ibibazo vy'amagara. Yarongereje ibiro gushika ku 128, agira indwara y'umutima mu 2004, ivyamutumye amara umwanya munini ariko aravurwa. Yarabazwe ku nda kugira bamufashe kugabanya ibiro, araja no kuba muri Cuba mu gihe yariko ararwana no guheba gufata ibiyayuramutwe. N'aho habaye ivyo vyose, nticabujije ko Maradona agenwa kumenyereza umurwi wa Argentine mu 2008 akaba yaranawushikanye mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mu nkino z'isi yose  inyuma y'imyaka ibiri, imbere y'uko batsindwa n'Ubudagi ibitsindo 4-0.

column2: Coronavirus: Umuti wa Remdesivir wariko urageragezwa kuyivura warananiwe
column3: Igerageza rya mbere ry'umuti wari wizewe ko ushobora kuvura coronavirus rivugwa ko ataco ryatanze. Hari icizere c'uko umuti remdesivir wari gushobora kuvura Covid-19. Ariko igerageza ryabereye mu Bushinwa ryerekana ko uwo muti ataco washitseko, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icegeranyo caciye mu ryahumye umuryango ujejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko uwo muti utashoboye no gutanga ka mitende kubarwayi canke ngo ubure ugabanye n'umugera mu maraso. Ihinguriro ryo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ryakoze uwo muti,  Gilead Sciences, rivuga ko iryo geragezwa ryafashwe ukurati ko. Amakuru y'uko iryo gerageza ataco ryashitseko yagiye kumenyekana inyuma y'aho OMS yerekaniye ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwayo icegeranyo c'ivyavuye muri iryo gerageza, ariko mu nyuma ikaza kugikurako. OMS ibandanya ivuga ko habaye ukwihenda mu gushira ahabona ico cegeranyo. Ico cegeranyo cerekana ko iryo geragezwa ryakorewe ku barwayi 237, aho abashika 158 bahawe uwo muti kugira ngo barabe ko hari igihinduka bagereranije n'abandi 79 bobo bahawe iyindi yo gupfupfahaza. Inyuma y'ukwezi, ibice 13.9% vy'abarwaye bahawe uwo muti barapfuye, mu gihe ibice 12.8% vya bamwe bahabwa imiti yo gupfupfahaza aribo bapfuye. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kiti: "remdesivir nta kintu yamariye abawufashe, haba mu kubavura canke mu kugabanya ubukari". Gilead iriyamiriza ico cegeranyo ca OMS. Umwe mu bavugizi ba Gilead avuga ati: "Twibaza ko inkuru yatanzwe yarimwo ibintu bitari vyo ku vyerekeye iryo gerageza". Yongera ko y'uko iryo gerageza ryahagaritswe haciye akanya gato kubera atari benshi baryitabiriye, vyumvikana ko ibitigiri bitari bikwiye. Ati: "Ikiboneka ni uko iryo gerageza ritarangiye, kuko ibiharuro vyerekana ko remdisivir ishobora kugira akarusho, cane cane mu gihe abarwaye bivujije hakiri kare". Hagati aho, si ukuvuga ko ivy'uwo muti birangiriye aha, kuko ibikorwa vyo kuwugerageza bibandanya mu minsi iri imbere bikazoshobora kwerekana neza isanamu nyayo ku vyerekeye ikoreshwa ryawo.

column2: Brexit: Boris Johnson arashima amasezerano y'ubudandaji hagati ya UK na EU
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya, EU, n'Ubwongereza bashitse ku masezerano azogenga ubudandaji inyuma ya Brexit, aje kurangiza amezi yo kutumvikana ku burenganzira bwo kuroba n'amategeko agenga ubudandaji. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku biro iwe, Boris Johnson yagize ati:"Twasubiranye ubwigenge ku mategeko yaco hamwe na kazoza kacu." Umushikiranganji wa mbere yongeyeko ko, n'aho ibiganiro "vyari bigoye" ari "amasezerano meza ku Buraya bwose" azotanga akazi n'iterambere. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe rya Buraya Ursula Von der Leyen yavuze ko ari amasezerano "ata ho yegamiye". Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru I Bruxelles, umukuru w'akanama k'ubumwe bwa Buraya yavuze ati:"Rwari urugendo rurerure rurimwo ibihuhusi ariko twaronse amasezerano meza twerekana. "Ni nyayo, nta ho yegamiye, kandi n'ikintu ciza cari gikwiriye gukorwa ku mpande zose." Yongeyeko ko ubu ari "igihe co kwibagira kahise tukaraba muri kazoza" kandi ko Ubwongereza "buguma ari ncuti nyakuri". Yavuze ko hazoba ikiringo mfatakibanza c'imyaka itanu n'igice mu bakora mu gisata c'uburovyi. Hanyuma imigenderanire izobandanya ku bibazo bijanye n'ihindukagurika ry'ibihe, amasoko ntanganguvu, umutekano hamwe no mu gutwara abantu n'ibintu. Mw'itangazo, ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere mu Bwongereza bigira biti:"Turagarukanye amahera yacu, imbibe, amategeko, ubudandaji hamwe n'amazi turobamwo," Risubiramwo icivugo ca Johnson co kwiyamamaza mu matora, ryongeyeko  "Brexit iragiye mu bikorwa". Johnson yashize kuri Twitter ifoto yiwe ariko aramwenyura, yashize intoke z'ibikumu hejuru. Mu kiganiro yatanze, yavuze:"Turarangije amasezerano akomeye aciye imiriyaridi 668 y'amapawundi ku mwaka. "Amasezerano yumvikana ameze nk'aya Canada hagati y'Ubwongereza na EU. Amasezerano azokingira ubuzi muri iki  gihugu cose, azotuma ibidandazwa vyo mu Bwongereza bigurishwa ata makori, ata n'ibice bitanzwe kw'isoko rya Buraya. "Amasezerano azoha uburenganzira amakompanyi gukorana n'ibihugu vy'incuti vy'i Buraya."
